C2 [ C ] a social event for a group of people who have not seen each other for a long time: We're having a family reunion next week. The college has an annual reunion for former students.
C2 [ C or U ] a situation when people meet again after they have not seen each other for a long time: She had a tearful reunion with her parents at the airport.
